entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Fog late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:39 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
